Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Enacts the safe havens for all-day enjoyment (SHADE) act
Summary: Enacts the "safe havens for all-day enjoyment (SHADE) act" directing the empire development corporation to develop a competitive grant program designed to assist municipalities in the state with establishing shaded public gathering spaces and public transportation areas to enhance the enjoyment and use of such spaces where there is no existing or insufficient sun protection.
LawSection: New York State Urban Development Corporation Act
LawCode: Add ยง16-bb, amd ยง16-m, UDC Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the urban development corporation act, in relation to enacting the "safe havens for all-day enjoyment (SHADE) act"
